appearances.title: U.S. House of Representatives U.S. House of Representatives : CSPAN : January 12, 2026 11:59am-12:26pm EST
appearances.snippet: as the coptic posts raul ruiz told me, all egyptians take their water from the nile. in that spirit, egypt has work to do. mr. speaker, i rise today to recognize the leadership of doctor cam patterson, our former chancellor of the university of arkansas for medical sciences. last year, doctor patterson announced his decision to step down from leadership after seven years of focused, dedicated service to the university, the medical school and the people of arkansas. under his leadership, uams continued its commitment to excellence as uams faced the challenges of covid 19 pandemic. doctor patterson helped expand access to care across the state and navigated the pandemic while strengthening the university's reputation for excellence in research, patient care, and medical education as he remains at uams as a professor of cardiovascular medicine, doctor patterson will continue to advance his spirit of innovation, compassion and service. thank you, doctor patterson, for your leadership, for always putting arkansas families first. mr. speaker, i rise in condolence to jill la
